comment.author: 8815458@N04
comment._content: The gentleman pictured fourth from the left (to the right of Captain Rostron) is James Gordon Patridge Bisset, Second Officer of the SS Carpathia. Bisset would go on to become Master of both Queen Mary and Queen Elizabeth  during World War II. He was later named Commodore of the Cunard Line and was knighted in the 1940s.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Rikkma:  Thanks for the additional information. We will add Bisset's name to the record next time we update.
